title: Projected Noise

* [[Book of Party Tricks]]
|castingnoise=2 |spellnoise=30 }} {{flavour|This spell produces a noise emanating from a place of the caster's own choosing.}} [[Projected Noise]] is a level 2 [[Hexes]] spell which created a deafening noise originating from a tile of your choosing, anywhere on the known map of the current level. ==Strategy== A great spell for luring foes. Projected Noise allows you to stay on a staircase and bring monsters to you. It is recommended to explore a chunk of the level before doing that. Provided that all 3 staircases aren't in the same location, using Projected Noise around the level makes it safer to clear a floor. Can also be used to lure monsters away from a given spot. Projected Noise can also trivialize the later [[Ziggurat]] floors. One needed only to cast it at the lowest point of the [[Ziggurat]] and run around the upper part to avoid all monsters and gain access to the loot/[[stairs]]. ==History== * Projected Noise was removed in [[0.11]].
